testcase.name: testContarPersonasPorNombre

error.message: PreparedStatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [select count(*) from persona where nombre = ?]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'springpruebas.persona' doesn't exist
